Anyone in %1$s with the link
%2$s account required

Anyone with the link
No sign-in required
"Some files can't be shared because you don't have sufficient access."
"Some files won't be shared because you don't have sufficient access."
To use Inbox by Gmail, you need a Google Account.
This item cannot be marked as Done
Always add messages sent to %1$s to %2$s
Always exclude messages sent to %1$s from %2$s
Turn on sync to get notifications for this account.
Your administrator has disabled Inbox for your domain. Please use Gmail instead or contact your administrator if you would like to use Inbox with this account.
"Your organisation isn't set up for Inbox yet."
BigTop has become Inbox. Please uninstall BigTop and download Inbox.
Unfortunately, this version of Inbox is no longer supported. Please upgrade your app.
Something went wrong. Try again later.
No connection. Try signing in later.
Selection mode exited, all items are unselected
Screen %1$d of %2$d. What would you like to bundle?
Screen %1$d of %2$d. Use bundles to group messages and get clutter out of your way.
Screen %1$d of %2$d. Add reminders to the top of your inbox.
Screen %1$d of %2$d. Learn %3$d things that you can do in Inbox. See highlights instantly. No need to dig through emails.
Screen %1$d of %2$d. See highlights instantly. No need to dig through emails.
Screen %1$d of %2$d. Snooze emails and reminders to return to your inbox whenever you want.
Tap here to create a Reminder instead to get things done
Previous matching messages may take some time to appear.
"This will discard any changes you've made."
It is bundled in your inbox.
It is bundled in your inbox and will only be shown once a day.
Finance includes messages such as bills and bank statements.
Forums includes messages from mailing lists and discussion groups.
"Low priority includes messages that you're less likely to read."
Updates includes notifications from online accounts, such as alerts and confirmations.
Promos includes marketing emails, such as deals and offers.
"Saved includes articles, videos and other links that you've saved for later."
Purchases includes purchase-related emails, such as receipts and delivery updates.
Travel includes flight confirmations, hotel reservations and other travel-related emails.
This change will close %1$s and unbundle its messages in the inbox.
"Couldn't authorise account. Please try again later"
Error while opening file to upload
Failed to upload %1$s. Received a %2$d from server.
The files that you are trying to send exceed the %1$s MB attachment limit.
Create a Reminder instead to get things done
All your email searches will be removed across all your devices.
There was an error while deleting your search history
No connection. Please try again later.
"Your message couldn't be saved because it exceeds the maximum size. Please remove some text, inline images or attachments."
"Your message couldn't be sent because it exceeds the maximum size. Please remove some text, inline images or attachments."
Messages in %1$s will be bundled in the inbox
New messages in %1$s will skip the inbox
Messages in %1$s will be shown individually in the inbox
"Emails won't be deleted, just the label."
includes finance-related emails, such as bills and bank statements
includes messages from mailing lists and discussion groups
"To improve accuracy, move messages to or from the %1$s label. "
"includes messages that you're less likely to read"
includes notifications from online accounts, such as alerts and confirmations
includes marketing emails, such as deals and offers
"includes articles, videos and other links that you've saved for later"
includes purchase-related emails, such as receipts and delivery updates
includes messages from social networks and other social media services
includes travel-related emails, such as flight confirmations and hotel bookings
Will apply to messages like these
Notifications are disabled for this account
As messages arrive, mark them as Done
Would you also like to remove existing messages in %1$s from the inbox?
Your email will be sent after the uploads are complete
Your message may have been sent.
All Spam items have been permanently deleted.
Items that have been in Spam for more than 30 days will be automatically deleted.
All Bin items have been permanently deleted.
Items that have been in the Bin for more than 30 days will be automatically deleted.
Marking this Reminder as Done also deletes future Reminders in the series.
Deleting this Reminder also deletes future Reminders in the series.
Are you sure you want to end this repeating reminder?
Please enter a valid email address
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
Oops, something went wrong. Recent changes may not have saved.
DownloadManager is disabled. Please enable it.
DownloadManager is unavailable. Inbox does not work without it.
Sorry, there was an error while retrieving search results.
"Sorry, couldn't connect to search. Please check your network connection."
Sorry, the network took too long to retrieve your search results.
Double-check the email addresses you have entered before sending.
Please specify at least one recipient.
No connection. Your Out of Office AutoReply will take effect when you reconnect.
"You'll only be notified when important emails arrive in your inbox."
Could not be removed from Highlights
Train Inbox on whether to highlight similar emails in the future.
Training makes Highlights better. Train more any time in Settings.
There are no emails available to classify right now. Visit Settings to try again soon.
There are no emails available to classify right now. Try again later.
You can move stuff here yourself or go to Settings to have messages added automatically.
Anything that you delete will be shown here.
Anything that you mark as Done will be stored safely here.
Save a draft message and it will be shown here.
Anything you pin is shown here, so you can keep track of the things that you need to get back to.
Create a Reminder and it will be shown here.
Send a message and it will be shown here.
Spam filters out unwanted messages. Move unwanted messages into Spam to improve its accuracy.
"Anything that you Snooze will go here until it's time for it to return to the inbox."
Moved to %1$s and marked as Done
By accepting, you agree to the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Location Terms of Service.
Unable to open this video link.
"Google will use your device's Location Services to improve Reminder suggestions and let you snooze email messages or Reminders to a place (Home, Work and more) and show them when you arrive."
To use Snooze to a Place, go to Settings and turn location on (with WiFi enabled)
To use Snooze to a Place, go to Settings and turn location on and choose \"High accuracy\" or \"Battery saving\" from the \"Mode\" menu
Why is this message in Spam?
Someone might be trying to trick you by using similar-looking characters (such as Σ and E) in the email addresses contained in this message.
This email claims to come from %1$s, but replies will go to an email address at another domain.
It might contain a virus or a malicious link.
This message contains one or more attachments with anomalous file extensions or file types.
This email has an attachment that allows unverified scripts to run on your computer when opened.
"This message is probably spam. It appears to be a fake \"bounce\" reply to a message that you didn't actually send."
It contains links to websites hosting malware.
"Our systems couldn't verify that this message was really sent by %1$s. You might want to avoid clicking links or replying with personal information."
According to our filters, this message is likely to be spam.

"This person's name is similar to a name in your organisation but the email address does not belong to your domain or the email is not authenticated. Avoid clicking on links or replying with sensitive information unless you contact the sender by another means to ensure that this email is legitimate."
We think that this message is spam. The message content is empty.
"This message contains one or more encrypted attachments that can't be scanned for viruses."
This message may not have been sent by %1$s.
Your organisation asked for messages like this to be marked as spam.
"We think that this message is spam, as it's written in a different language from the one you usually use in your messages."
"It contains content that's typically used to steal personal information."
"This may be a spoofed message. %1$s couldn't verify that it was actually sent from your account."
This message was not sent to Spam because of a filter that you created.
"You tried to unsubscribe from this sender but they didn't provide a way to do that, so new messages are put directly into Spam to keep them out of your inbox."
This person has never corresponded with you using this email address.
Many people marked similar messages as phishing scams, so this might contain unsafe content.
Many people marked similar messages as spam.
"Similar messages were used to steal people's personal information. Unless you trust the sender, don't click links or reply with personal information."
Your organisation asked for messages like this to be marked as spam.
"This message was not sent to Spam, based on your organisation's request."
%1$s cannot reach you via your Google+ profile at this time.
"It has a from address that has failed %1$s's required tests for authentication."
"You've blocked %1$s. Messages from this address will be marked as Spam."
Lots of messages from %1$s are spam.
"Similar messages were used to steal people's personal information. Unless you trust the sender, don't click links or reply with personal information."
"Similar messages were used to steal people's personal information. Unless you trust the sender, don't click any links or reply with any personal information."
"The sender's account may have been compromised and used to send malicious messages."
"It contains a suspicious link that was used to steal people's personal information. Unless you trust the sender, don't click links or reply with personal information."
"%1$s couldn't verify that %2$s actually sent this message (and not a spammer)."
"You've unblocked %1$s. Messages from this address will appear in your inbox."
"You've previously marked messages from %1$s as phishing."
"You've previously marked messages from %1$s as spam."
"It is in violation of Google's recommended email sender guidelines."
You tried to unsubscribe from this sender but they continued to send you emails, so new messages are put directly into Spam to keep them out of your inbox.
"Your administrator has disabled Inbox for your domain. If you were working on something, don't worry! Your changes have been saved in Gmail."
We can turn off notifications in the Gmail app so that you are only notified by Inbox for new messages.
Getting duplicate notifications from Gmail and Inbox?
Notify me about all emails, unless otherwise specified by their label
Notify me about my most important emails
Tap to grant permission. Permission is needed for snoozing by location.
Tap to update via Play Store
Inbox will not sync until more storage space is available on your device. Tap this notification to see how storage is currently used on your device.
Emails that you might have forgotten to respond to will appear at the top of your inbox
Sent emails that you might need to follow up on will appear at the top of your inbox
Suggest emails to follow up on
You are currently offline. Search results may be limited.
All of your bundles are already set up to Skip the inbox! As these messages arrive, they will be marked as Done. You can change this for each bundle in its settings.
Unbundled messages appear individually in the inbox. You can always change this later.
What would you like to bundle?
Sweep marks all unpinned items in this section as Done
These messages are currently shown individually in your inbox, but can be bundled together, if you prefer.
These messages currently skip your inbox, but can be bundled in your inbox, if you prefer.
Use bundles to group messages and get clutter out of your way.
Add reminders to the top of your inbox.
See highlights instantly. No need to trawl through emails.
Snooze emails and reminders to come back to your inbox when you want.
Blitz Air, Running Club, Rabbit Facts
"Let's meet at 4 p.m. at the entrance"
Thanks! Your feedback helps us improve your search experience.
An error occurred. Please retry your search.

Please allow notifications from Inbox in Settings
Notifications have been turned off for Inbox
The operation has been stopped. Some deletions will still be processed.
You are about to permanently delete all items. Do you want to continue?
Unable to permanently delete all items. Some items may have been deleted.
You must be online in order to perform this operation.
Report additional diagnostics to help improve Inbox
Show most important part of message
Show occasional tips for unsubscribing from bulk senders that you rarely read
When the device is in vibrate mode, notification sounds will still trigger vibrations.
This change will only apply to new messages.
Your signature will be added to your message when you send it.
All messages will download when connected
Travelling to a new time zone
Write down the things you need to do and keep them in your inbox

"Saved! Learn an easier way to save."
"Share the photo that you've just taken?"
The inbox that works for you
Start composing your reply with one tap
"Can't Snooze to time that has already passed"
Wait a second – Inbox is backing up some changes to your account.
"Anything you mark as Done is safely stored here. Emails you've previously archived are also here."
Use the Inbox Share button to save articles, videos and other links for later
Error: Reminder title cannot be empty

"It looks like you've moved to %1$s (%2$s).
Would you like to update your snoozed emails and reminders to this time zone?"
Unable to provide suggestions without contacts permission
Unable to choose place for snoozing without location permission
Unable to show media picker without storage permission
Unable to save without storage permission
Like %s? Tell others what you think by writing a quick review.

"This action will not delete individual messages within this trip.
You will not see this trip again in Inbox, Google Now or any other Google products.
You cannot undo this action."
You need to be online to delete this trip
"After this action, emails will appear individually in the inbox. You cannot undo this action."
Swipe right to mark this as Done.
Tap the Link button to save or share a copied link.
You can always disable this bundle later in Settings.
You can also set it to only show up once per day or once per week.
Everything you mark as done is safely stored in Done.
To move an item back to the inbox, just pin it.
Pin this if you want to keep track of it.
Tap here to see just your pinned things.
You can now save links to Inbox so that you can return to them later.
Swipe left to snooze this for later.
Everything you snooze goes to Snoozed until you return to your inbox.
Next time, create a Reminder here.
Voice search is not supported on this device.
OK, let me get back to you
on the same day each month
on the last day of the month
